script.name: plugin.guilds.doexp
script.sourceplaintext:
* check for valid parameters if not is datatype[ $a.exp ] == DATATYPE_INT return null else if $a.exp == 0 return null else if not $a.guild return null end
* check we have the guild data $guilds.data = get global variable: name='guilds.data' $page.id = get global variable: name='pageid.guilds' skip if $guilds.data return null
$tGuild = $guilds.data[$a.guild] skip if $tGuild return null
* not a membmer? skip if $tGuild['member'] return null
* add exp $level = $tGuild['level'] skip if $level $level = 0
$exp = $tGuild['exp'] skip if $exp $exp = 0
$level.icon = 107
$exp = $exp + $a.exp
$name = $tGuild['name'] $name = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=$name, null, null, null, null, null
* lost a level @ $max.level = [NULL] -> call script plugin.guilds.utils : type='getXP' Value1=10 Value 2=$a.guild
if $exp < 0 if $level > 0 dec $level = gosub sub.GetExpLevel $exp = $xp.needed + $exp $level.message = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=321, $name, null, null, null, null $var = sprintf: fmt='guild.%s.level', $a.guild, null, null, null, null send script event: name=$var, object=[PLAYERSHIP], param1=$level, param2=$exp else $exp = 0 end
else gosub sub.GetExpLevel if $exp >= $xp.needed if $level < 10 inc $level = $exp = $exp - $xp.needed
gosub sub.GetExpLevel while $exp >= $xp.needed inc $level = $exp = $exp - $xp.needed if $level >= 10 do if $exp > $max.level $exp = $max.level break end gosub sub.GetExpLevel end
$level.message = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=320, $name, null, null, null, null $var = sprintf: fmt='guild.%s.level', $a.guild, null, null, null, null send script event: name=$var, object=[PLAYERSHIP], param1=$level, param2=$exp * cap the max xp else if $exp > $max.level $exp = $max.level end end end
$hq.table = $tGuild['hq'] gosub sub.UpdateStation $hq.table = $tGuild['shipyard'] gosub sub.UpdateStation
$tGuild['level'] = $level $tGuild['exp'] = $exp
gosub sub.GetExpLevel $var = sprintf: fmt='guild.%s', $a.guild, null, null, null, null $name = $tGuild['name'] $rank.id = $tGuild['ranks'][$level] @ $percent = [THIS] -> call script plugin.guilds.utils : type='getXPPercent' Value1=$level Value 2=$exp set custom rank: id=$var, name page=$page.id, name id=$name, title page=$page.id, title id=$rank.id, percent=$percent
if $level.message if is datatype[ $a.delay ] == DATATYPE_INT if $a.delay > 0 @ = wait $a.delay ms end end play sample 1100 display notification: message=$level.message, icon=$level.icon end return null
sub.GetExpLevel: @ $xp.needed = [NULL] -> call script plugin.guilds.utils : type='getXP' Value1=$level Value 2=$a.guild endsub
sub.UpdateStation: if $hq.table $hq = $hq.table['obj'] if $hq -> exists $arr = $hq.table['sales'] if $arr if $hq -> is of class Station @ = $hq -> call script plugin.guilds.adjusthq : Guild Level=$level Sales Data=$arr end end end end endsub
return null

comment.var: check we have the guild data

sval.val: check we have the guild data
